pages.text:
About Us
.entry-header
About Us
Spreading the Cove
Our goal is to create the finest RV and Manufactured Home Communities in North America and the UK. For more than two decades, the Cove team has successfully acquired, operated and continuously worked to develop and enhance premier Manufactured Home Communities, RV Parks and Resorts.
Our Company
We bring our 20+ years of experience to every resort and community we own and acquire, infusing camaraderie and a village-like atmosphere. At Cove Communities, we are committed to investing in properties, and by doing so, improving lives and the world around us.
We invest in the most desirable amenities and activities, and are known for providing outstanding customer service, so that our residents and guests can enjoy the lifestyle of their dreams. We’re proud to create resorts and communities with a village-like atmosphere that we, and our closest friends and family members, would be delighted to call home.
Our Mission
To own and operate communities in prime destinations that offer a lifestyle guests and residents love to live.
Our Vision
To create a world where exceptional customer service and generosity are second nature and hospitality is a passion.
Our Culture
We’re passionate about making Cove Communities the best possible place to work, visit, and live. While our properties are exceptional, we know it’s our people – the relationships they build and the level of service they provide – that consistently sets us apart. That’s why we’re dedicated to hiring, retaining, and rewarding talented teammates who are not only great at what they do but who naturally align with our culture and live our values. Cove Communities is built on six core values that drive business decisions and our interactions with residents, guests, investment partners, and one another.
Our Core Values
Hospitality
We love what we do, and it shows. Being friendly, warm and welcoming comes naturally to us – it’s who we are and it’s what we do.
Excellence
We raise the bar. Every day, we set out to deliver outstanding experiences for our residents and guests. We focus on exceeding their expectations.
Passion
We make every moment count. We strive to create an environment our teammates look forward to coming to every day & our guests never want to leave.
Trustworthiness
We consistently do the right thing. Trust is the foundation for a great relationship, and relationships are what our business is built on.
Stewardship
We value the world and care for it. We value the people, properties and resources entrusted to us. The ability to give back is a privilege.
Kindness
We follow the golden rule. Simply put, we treat others as we’d like to be treated – with respect, consideration and compassion.
Cove Cares
We invest our time, talents, and resources to make a positive impact. We’re committed to making our villages the best they can be. Cove is in the business of caring, caring for team members and for each of our communities and resorts, caring for residents and guests, and for the greater communities in which we operate.
Cove Cares
is the heartbeat of our organization, bringing residents, Cove team members, and charitable organizations together to do more.
Our Sponsored Projects
Disabled American Veterans
Empowering veterans to lead high-quality lives with respect and dignity by providing outreach and services to the American people generally, and to disabled veterans specifically.
Learn more
CURE Childhood Cancer
Powering research to improve childhood cancer treatments and to find a cure. CreekFire RV Resort in Savannah, GA proudly supports the cancer charity with very personal ties to the RV park.
Learn more
St. Vincent De Paul
Dedicated to feeding, clothing, housing and healing individuals and families in our community who have nowhere else to turn for help. As important, SVdP provides meaningful opportunities for volunteers to serve their neighbors in need with love and compassion.
Learn more
Circle the City
Delivers innovative healthcare solutions that compassionately address the needs of men, women, and children facing homelessness.
Learn more
Arizona Humane Society
With a vision to end animal suffering, AHS rescues, heals, adopts and advocates for sick, injured and abused animals.
Learn more
Two Pups Wellness Fund
Provides financial assistance, through shelters and rescues, for the life-saving care of animals who are critically ill, injured, neglected, abused or abandoned.
Learn more
American Cancer Society
Supporting cancer research, sharing expert information, supporting patients, spreading the word about prevention. All so people can live longer – and better.
Learn more
Boys Hope Girls Hope
Helps academically talented and motivated youth-in-need meet their full potential and become men and women for others by providing value-centered, family-like homes, mentoring, opportunities and education from grade school through college.
Learn more
Teach for America
Teach For America finds outstanding leaders who commit to expanding educational opportunity, beginning with at least two years teaching in an under-resourced public school. Working shoulder-to-shoulder with students, educators, and community members, corps members go beyond traditional expectations to support the academic and personal growth of their students.
Learn more
World Vision
World Vision is a global Christian humanitarian organization. They partner with children, families, and their communities to reach their full potential by tackling the causes of poverty and injustice.
Learn more
C4 Foundation
The C4 Foundation provides support and resources through science-based programs to active-duty Navy SEALs and their families.
Learn more
Guiding Eyes for the Blind
For more than 60 years, Guiding Eyes has provided their entire program free of charge to every student who can be helped by a guide dog. Guiding Eyes changes lives by connecting amazing people with extraordinary dogs.
Learn more
Cops & Kids Event
The Phoenix F.O.P. Lodge #2 Cops and Kids program is designed to unite Phoenix Officers and public safety employees with local disadvantaged children for a special day of shopping. The children shop with officers for necessary back-to-school supplies.
Learn more
.entry-content

Point Sebago Golf Memberships
Golf Course Highlights
As a member of one of Maine’s best golf courses, play as often as you like, participate in special tournaments and social events, and join a community of friendly, avid golfers.
4 full-size practice greens
75-yard short game area
Members-only grass range tee and two additional grass range tees
6 tee box selections
Championship Yardage: 6,957 yards
Forward Yardage: 4,793 yards
Electric Golf Carts
Visage Software with Yardage Measurement
BOOK A TEE TIME
Or call us at
Or call us at 207-558-8040
Course Membership Advantages
Member Tee Time Booking –
Reserve tee times 25 days in advance
Membership Cards –
Associated to Golf Shop, 19th Hole, special event benefits
Golf Shop 15% Off Logoed Apparel
(Given with Proof of Membership)
Member / Guest Tee Time Rate
15% off rack rate when playing with a member
Invitations
to select member-only golf and social events
Reciprocal Courses –
For reciprocal courses, please notify one week in advance for best availability. $45 with cart, contact the Golf Shop at Point Sebago at 207-558-8040, and we will call to reserve your request.

Join Our Team
.entry-header
Join our Team
VIEW AVAILABLE POSITIONS
Our Culture
We’re passionate about making Cove Communities the best possible place to work, visit, and live. While our properties are exceptional, we know it’s our people – the relationships they build and the level of service they provide – that consistently sets us apart. That’s why we’re dedicated to hiring, retaining, and rewarding talented team members who are not only great at what they do, but who naturally align with our culture and live our values. Cove Communities is built on six core values that drive business decisions and our interactions with residents, guests, investment partners, and one another.
Our Core Values
Hospitality, Excellence, Passion, Trustworthiness, Stewardship, Kindness
LEARN MORE
Our Commitment
Cove is An Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, or national origin.
Our Commitment to You
Cove is a home. Cove is a lifestyle. Cove is a place everyone belongs.
Today, tomorrow and for decades to come, you can count on the Cove Communities team to lead the industry by putting people first, doing business the right way and remaining focused on:
Enhancing the daily lives of our residents and guests
Giving back to the communities we serve
Providing rewarding careers for teammates
Creating shareholder value for investors
Making a difference in the world in which we live
We’re Looking for People People
Cove team members are friendly, warm, and welcoming. Every day, we set out to deliver outstanding experiences for our residents and guests. We are passionate about making every moment count, consistently doing the right thing, and being kind to one another. We hold great value for the world we live in and make every effort to manage our business sustainably.
If you are a people person and value what we value, we want to talk to you.
VIEW AVAILABLE POSITIONS
Great Place to Work Certified
Cove Communities is proud to be Certified™ by Great Place to Work®! The prestigious award is based entirely on what current employees say about their experience working at Cove.
Cove has maintained its Great Place to Work status for the last three consecutive years.
According to Great Place to Work research, job seekers are 4.5 times more likely to find a great boss at a Certified great workplace. Additionally, employees at Certified workplaces are 93% more likely to look forward to coming to work, and are twice as likely to be paid fairly, earn a fair share of the company’s profits and have a fair chance at promotion.
Looking to grow your career at a company that puts its people first? We’re hiring!
APPLY TODAY
Our Benefits
Team Member Resort Stay Discounts
Refer a Friend Bonus
Team Member Gifts
Restaurant, Travel, and Wellness Discounts
Medical, Dental, and Vision Plans
Paid Volunteer Days
Tuition Reimbursement
EAP Program
Caught Being Cove Recognition Program
Cove team members are friendly, warm, and welcoming. Every day, we set out to deliver outstanding experiences for our residents and guests. We are passionate about making every moment count, consistently doing the right thing, and being kind to one another. We hold great value for the world we live in and make every effort to manage our business sustainably.
If you are a people person and value what we value, we want to talk to you.
Cove Cares
We invest our time, talents and resources to make a positive impact. We’re committed to making our villages the best they can be. Cove is in the business of caring: caring for team members, each of our communities and resorts, residents and guests, and for the greater communities in which we operate. Cove Cares is our organization’s heartbeat, bringing residents, Cove team members, and charitable organizations together to do more. Our team members devote time and resources to causes close to their hearts. Through a variety of volunteering efforts and financial donations, Cove is a place that continually enriches the community and improves the lives of others.
SEE OUR SPONSORED PROJECTS
